ai-patthana16.66:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.66:0.3_0: Talking for oneself, they look for proximate cause negligence.
ai-patthana16.66:1.1_0: Without repulsion of the mind doesn’t give rise to the thought, not for the sake of sustained thought.
ai-patthana16.66:1.1_1: An invisible mind doesn’t give rise to repulsion. ...
ai-patthana16.66:1.1_2: Such mind doesn’t give rise to repulsion.
ai-patthana16.66:2.1_0: One who has not dedicated to the higher mind. Not for the sake of non-violence is a condition for the sake of impingement.
ai-patthana16.66:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
